languages.text: "Еще раз благодарю вас за спасение моего отряда, Вольный Торговец. Мы высадимся на Футфоле — зацепки по расследованию ведут в верфь, и не лишним будет навестить наместника Владайма. Уверен, он не откажет Арбитес в содействии".

"Thank you once again for rescuing my squad, Rogue Trader. We will disembark on Footfall — the trail of evidence leads to the docks, and it wouldn't hurt to pay the Liege a visit. I am sure he will graciously extend his cooperation to the Arbites."
languages.original_text: "Еще раз благодарю вас за спасение моего отряда, Вольный Торговец. Мы высадимся на Футфоле — зацепки по расследованию ведут в верфь, и не лишним будет навестить наместника Владайма. Уверен, он не откажет Арбитес в содействии".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you once again for rescuing my squad, Rogue Trader. We will disembark on Footfall — the trail of evidence leads to the docks, and it wouldn't hurt to pay the Liege of Footfall a visit. I am sure he will graciously extend his cooperation to the Arbites."

"Thank you once again for rescuing my squad, Rogue Trader. We will disembark on Footfall — the trail of evidence leads to the docks, and it wouldn't hurt to pay the Liege of Footfall a visit. I am sure he will graciously extend his cooperation to the Arbites."

"Thank you once again for rescuing my squad, Rogue Trader. We will disembark on Footfall — the trail of evidence leads to the docks, and it wouldn't hurt to pay the Liege of Footfall a visit. I am sure he will graciously extend his cooperation to the Arbites."

"Thank you once again for rescuing my squad, Rogue Trader. We will disembark on Footfall — the trail of evidence leads to the docks, and it wouldn't hurt to pay the Liege of Footfall a visit. I am sure he will graciously extend his cooperation to the Arbites."

"Thank you once again for rescuing my squad, Rogue Trader. We will disembark on Footfall — the trail of evidence leads to the docks, and it wouldn't hurt to pay the Liege a visit. I am sure he will graciously extend his cooperation to the Arbites."

"Thank you once again for rescuing my squad, Rogue Trader. We will disembark on Footfall — the trail of evidence leads to the docks, and it wouldn't hurt to pay the Liege a visit. I am sure he will graciously extend his cooperation to the Arbites."

languages.text: "Danke noch einmal, dass Ihr meinen Trupp gerettet habt, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Wir gehen auf Footfall von Bord ... die Hinweise führen in die Docks und es kann nicht schaden, dem Lehnsherrn einen Besuch abzustatten. Ich bin sicher, er wird seine Kooperation auf die Arbites ausweiten."
languages.original_text: "Thank you once again for rescuing my squad, Rogue Trader. We will disembark on Footfall — the trail of evidence leads to the docks, and it wouldn't hurt to pay the Liege a visit. I am sure he will graciously extend his cooperation to the Arbites."

traits.locale_text: "Danke noch einmal, dass Ihr meinen Trupp gerettet habt, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Wir gehen auf Footfall von Bord ... die Hinweise führen in die Docks und es kann nicht schaden, dem Lehnsherrn einen Besuch abzustatten. Ich bin sicher, er wird seine Kooperation auf die Arbites ausweiten."

"Proktor Anthar bat mich, Euch mitzuteilen, dass er und seine Arbitratoren auf Footfall von Bord gehen werden, um ihre Untersuchung fortzusetzen. Überdies möchte er Euch noch einmal für die Rettung seines Trupps danken und versichert Euch, dass der Marschall von Eurer wertvollen Unterstützung erfahren wird."

languages.text: « Je tiens à vous remercier une nouvelle fois d'avoir sauvé mon escouade, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Nous débarquerons à Castel : les indices nous mènent vers les docks et il serait judicieux de rencontrer le suzerain. Je suis convaincu qu'il acceptera également de coopérer avec l'Arbites. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you once again for rescuing my squad, Rogue Trader. We will disembark on Footfall — the trail of evidence leads to the docks, and it wouldn't hurt to pay the Liege a visit. I am sure he will graciously extend his cooperation to the Arbites."

traits.locale_text: « Je tiens à vous remercier une nouvelle fois d'avoir sauvé mon escouade, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Nous débarquerons à Castel : les indices nous mènent vers les docks et il serait judicieux de rencontrer le suzerain. Je suis convaincu qu'il acceptera également de coopérer avec l'Arbites. »

« Le proctor Anthar m'a demandé de vous informer que ses arbitrators et lui débarqueront à Castel afin de poursuivre leur enquête. Il souhaite également vous remercier une fois encore d'avoir secouru son escouade et vous assure que le maréchal entendra parler de l'aide inestimable que vous leur avez fournie. »

languages.text: “再次感谢你拯救了我的小队，行商浪人。我们会在落脚港下船，所有的证据都指向那边的码头，我也该去和落脚港的总督见个面了。我相信，他一定会积极配合帝国法务部的工作。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you once again for rescuing my squad, Rogue Trader. We will disembark on Footfall — the trail of evidence leads to the docks, and it wouldn't hurt to pay the Liege a visit. I am sure he will graciously extend his cooperation to the Arbites."

traits.locale_text: “再次感谢你拯救了我的小队，行商浪人。我们会在落脚港下船，所有的证据都指向那边的码头，我也该去和落脚港的总督见个面了。我相信，他一定会积极配合帝国法务部的工作。”
“安萨监察官要求我通知您，他和他的法务官小队将会前往落脚港，以便继续进行调查。他希望能再次向您表达谢意，感谢您拯救了他的小队。他保证会将这一切告知元帅本人，让元帅了解到您提供的宝贵协助。”

languages.text: «Gracias otra vez por rescatar a mi unidad, Comerciante Independiente. Desembarcaremos en Paso. Las pruebas conducen al muelle, y una visita al Señor no estaría de más. Seguro que colabora plenamente con el Arbites».
languages.original_text: "Thank you once again for rescuing my squad, Rogue Trader. We will disembark on Footfall — the trail of evidence leads to the docks, and it wouldn't hurt to pay the Liege a visit. I am sure he will graciously extend his cooperation to the Arbites."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias otra vez por rescatar a mi unidad, Comerciante Independiente. Desembarcaremos en Paso. Las pruebas conducen al muelle, y una visita al Señor no estaría de más. Seguro que colabora plenamente con el Arbites».

«El Procurador Anthar me ha pedido que le informe de que sus Arbitrator y él desembarcarán en Paso para poder continuar su investigación. También quería que le diera las gracias por rescatar a su gente y asegurarle que el Mariscal se enterará de la valiosa ayuda que les ha proporcionado».

languages.text: 「改めて私の隊を救出してくださり、ありがとうございます、ローグトレーダー。私たちはフットフォールで下船します。証拠の手がかりはドックへと続いていますし、領主を訪ねるのも悪くありません。彼はきっと快く高等裁定局に協力してくれるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Thank you once again for rescuing my squad, Rogue Trader. We will disembark on Footfall — the trail of evidence leads to the docks, and it wouldn't hurt to pay the Liege a visit. I am sure he will graciously extend his cooperation to the Arbites."

traits.locale_text: 「改めて私の隊を救出してくださり、ありがとうございます、ローグトレーダー。私たちはフットフォールで下船します。証拠の手がかりはドックへと続いていますし、領主を訪ねるのも悪くありません。彼はきっと快く高等裁定局に協力してくれるでしょう」
「アンサール代理人からの伝言です。彼とアービトレイターたちは調査を続けるため、フットフォールで下船します。それから、部隊を救出してくれたことに改めて感謝しているとのことです。あなたの貴重な支援は、必ず将帥に伝えると約束していました」

languages.text: "Mangamı kurtardığınız için bir kez daha teşekkür ederim Hür Tacir. Binliman'da gemiden ineceğiz. Her şey rıhtımı işaret ediyor, gitmişken Emîr'i ziyaret etmekten de zarar gelmez. Eminim Yargıcılarla iş birliği yapma nezaketini gösterecektir."
languages.original_text: "Thank you once again for rescuing my squad, Rogue Trader. We will disembark on Footfall — the trail of evidence leads to the docks, and it wouldn't hurt to pay the Liege a visit. I am sure he will graciously extend his cooperation to the Arbites."

traits.locale_text: "Mangamı kurtardığınız için bir kez daha teşekkür ederim Hür Tacir. Binliman'da gemiden ineceğiz. Her şey rıhtımı işaret ediyor, gitmişken Emîr'i ziyaret etmekten de zarar gelmez. Eminim Yargıcılarla iş birliği yapma nezaketini gösterecektir."

"Üsteğmen Anthar, kendisi ve Yargıcılarının Binliman'da gemiden ayrılarak soruşturmalarını sürdürecekleri bilgisini iletmemi rica etti. Ayrıca mangasını kurtardığınız için bir kez daha teşekkür edip destek sağladığınızı Miralay'a bildireceğini söyledi."
